description: I try to Live by and respect

data.text: You cannot arrest an idea, it is bulletproof.
data.author: Anonymous

data.text: The Quiter you become, the more you are able to hear
data.author: Rumi

data.text: We only see two things in people; what we want to see, and what they want to show us.
data.author: James Remer

data.text: It is not the strongest species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the ones responsive to change.
data.author: Charles Darwin

data.text: As a programmer, it is your job to put yourself out of business. What you do today can be automated tomorrow
data.author: Doug McIlroy

data.text: Never spend 6 minutes doing something by hand when you can spend 6 hours failing to automate it
data.author: Zhuowei Zhang

data.text: Automated testing is a safety net that protects the program from its programmers.
data.author: Yegor Bugayenko
